reg_pit.title:
Mineral Land Reserve (Conditional Mineral
Claim Registrations) Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 82/2012, effective April 18, 2012.

section.sectiontext: A mineral reserve for all minerals is established over each parcel or tract of land identified by a site number and name set out in column 1 of the Table, within the mining division and land district set out in column 2 of the Table opposite the site number and name.

change.changenote: Section 3 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 82/2012, effective April 18, 2012.

section.sectiontext: A free miner may register a mineral claim in a reserve established by section 2 subject to the conditions listed in section 4.

change.changenote: Section 4 BEFORE amended by BC Reg 82/2012, effective April 18, 2012.

section.sectiontext: A free miner must not obstruct, endanger or interfere with, or allow any other person to obstruct, endanger or interfere with, the construction, operation or maintenance of a transmission line, pipeline or other work, structure or activity that is in a reserve established under section 2 and set out in column 3 of the Table opposite the site number and name of the reserve.

change.changenote: Site "1005762 John Hart Generating Facility" was cancelled by BC Reg 82/2012, effective April 18, 2012.
Site "1005902 John Hart Generating Facility" was established by BC Reg 82/2012, effective April 18, 2012.
Site "1005822 Honolulu Road Relocation" was cancelled by BC Reg 266/2012, effective September 12, 2012.
Site "1006102 Jumbo Glacier Resort Recreation Area" was added by BC Reg 296/2012, effective October 11, 2012.
Site "1006133 Cape Scott Wind Farm Transmission Line" was added by BC Reg 5/2013, effective January 23, 2013.
Sites "1006449 Lower Wahleach Hydroelectric Project" and "English Creek Hydro Project" were added by BC Reg 36/2015, effective March 9, 2015.
Site "1006528 Woodfibre Creek LNG" was established by BC Reg 128/2015, effective July 3, 2015.
Site "1006558 Wedgemount Creek" was established by BC Reg 121/2016, effective May 31, 2016.
Site "1006592 Long Lake Hydro Project" was established by BC Reg 123/2016, effective May 31, 2016.
Sites "1006545 Tamihi Creek" and "Hunter Creek" were established by BC Reg 123/2016, effective May 31, 2016.
Sites "1006612 Bouleau Mountain", "1006613 Wart and Pothole" and "1006614 Mount Hays" were established by BC Reg 157/2016, effective June 21, 2016.
Site "1006617 Fosthall Creek Hydro Project" was established by BC Reg 170/2016, effective July 6, 2016.
Site "1006658 Serpentine Creek transmission line" was established by BC Reg 4/2017, effective January 24, 2017.
Site "1006660 Long Lake Hydro Transmission Line" was established by BC Reg 30/2017, effective February 16, 2017.
Site "1006754 Trans-Canada 4-Laning (Kicking Horse Canyon)" was established by BC Reg 187/2019, effective July 24, 2019.
Site "1006878 Zincton Ski Resort Development" was established by BC Reg 159/2020, effective June 26, 2020.
Site "1006102 Jumbo Glacier Resort Recreation Area" was cancelled by BC Reg 141/2021, effective May 31, 2021.
